description: Jack Dillon has had it with big boss Caldwell and challenges his authority.  Caldwell helplessly submits to Dillon's power and follows his new boss's every command.  After being completely manhandled by Dillon's abuse and leather baton, Caldwell admits defeat and gets his fucking.
series: The Abduction Series, Part I - The Abduction
title: The Abduction Series, Part I - The Abduction, Scene #07
